item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Pro Controller Upgrades Shown In FCC Filings
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/nintendo-switch-2-pro-controller-upgrades-shown-in-fcc-filings/

With the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct almost upon us, details about the upcoming console’s Pro Controller have surfaced online. 

Nintendo Switch 2 Pro Controller Upgrades 

Spotted on Famiboards (via IGN), FCC Filings for the Nintendo Switch 2 Pro Controller have been revealed, providing an idea about the new upgrades for this device. The filing has been listed for ‘BEE-008’, a controller with both Bluetooth and NFC. Interestingly, the filing suggests that Nintendo could finally add a headphone jack to their Pro Controller for Switch 2. Moreover, the controller should feature a new battery, too.

The community has long requested a headphone jack for the Pro Controllers. When the console is docked, wired audio is impossible unless you are glued to the TV. However, with the upcoming console finally introducing voice chat for the platform, a headphone jack for the Pro Controller seems more likely. We will have to wait for the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct event tomorrow to know for sure. 

The Nintendo Switch 2 Direct event will last one hour and explain everything we need to know about the upcoming console. It will be followed by Nintendo Treehouse: Live, featuring hands-on gameplay for Switch 2 games. 

In other news, our recent exclusive sheds light on Switch 2 pre-order plans. Also, the dev kits or at least some of them, don’t have 4K output. What are your thoughts on the Nintendo Switch 2 Pro Controller upgrades? Let us know in the comments or on our community forum!

For more information from Insider Gaming, read how long the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct will last. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: What Time Does South of Midnight Release? Start Dates & Early Access Times Confirmed
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/what-time-does-south-of-midnight-release-start-dates-early-access-times-confirmed/

Compulsion Games is ready to bring the world South of Midnight. Its release date comes several years after its announcement, and the developer is preparing everyone for its debut by showcasing start times for its normal and Early Access launches.

If We Happy Few is anything to go by, then we already know South of Midnight is a can’t-miss adventure. Xbox shares Compulsion Games’ affinity for the weird and wonderful, and this is the first project under the Xbox banner. South of Midnight looks like a mature and realized vision, and its release date can’t come soon enough for some.

If you’re after the earliest possible start time, you’ve come to the right place.

South of Midnight Release Date

April 8 is the confirmed South of Midnight release date, and it’s one of the month’s biggest games.

South of Midnight—at the time of writing—hasn’t been subjected to a delay. It’s had little-to-no controversy and got a lot of hype ahead of its launch. It’s available to Xbox Series X|S and PC users, so let’s see if being available on these platforms helps its sales.

Also, South of Midnight being on Xbox Game Pass is sure to go in its favor.

South of Midnight Start Times

Expect South of Midnight to launch and get underway at 9 AM PDT / 11 AM CDT / 12 PM EDT / 5 PM BST.

Again, this is for the official launch date. South of Midnight’s release has several editions to consider, so depending on which one you opt for, there’s a chance you’re entitled to Early Access—giving you an earlier start time.

South of Midnight Early Access Start Times

The Premium and Premium Upgrade Editions come with five days of South of Midnight Early Access.

You can see the list of launch dates and times for certain regions below—thanks to the Xbox X page.

Check out some spellbinding South of Midnight gameplay if you haven’t already!

Let us know your thoughts on South of Midnight in our Insider Gaming Forum. Can it be a success? Or is it likely to do nothing for Microsoft on console or PC?

item.title: Is South of Midnight Coming to Xbox Game Pass?
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/is-south-of-midnight-coming-to-xbox-game-pass/

South of Midnight is one of Microsoft’s big hopes in 2025. The fantastical action game blends magical powers and exploration in its gothic setting, and Xbox users are keen to know if they can travel South of Midnight for an Xbox Game Pass launch.

You get a great deal whichever tier of Xbox Game Pass you opt for. The allure of free games is too good to pass up—especially when new releases go straight into the library. South of Midnight finally releases April 8 and (on paper) looks like one of Xbox’s most fascinating-looking exclusives in years.

After various trailers and gameplay footage have hyped up South of Midnight, it’s time for it to deliver. But let’s see if Compulsion Games delivers it straight to Xbox Game Pass.

Can You Play South of Midnight on Xbox Game Pass?

South of Midnight is a day one launch for Xbox Game Pass subscribers on PC and Xbox Series X|S.

The action-adventure title follows in the footsteps of 2025’s Avowed by launching on Xbox Game Pass from day one. From the first reveal trailer to the latest pre-release videos and build-up, Xbox has proudly proclaimed South of Midnight as a Game Pass incentive.

A Game Pass logo is slapped on almost anything to do with South of Midnight. In case you need any more confirmation, its official Xbox store page says this: “Play day one with Game Pass. Available 8 April 2025.”

So, if you don’t already, I’d consider signing up to save yourself a lot of money!

How to Play South of Midnight on Xbox Game Pass

You need a Standard or Ultimate subscription for Xbox Game Pass and a working internet connection to play South of Midnight once it launches.

Here are quick step-by-step instructions showing you what to do once you have your membership:

  1. Check your Xbox Game Pass status via your Xbox account.
  2. If it’s active, it’s time to go to the Xbox Store on console or PC.
  3. In the search function, look for South of Midnight.
  4. Click on the game page.
  5. Once the option is available, press to download the title.
  6. You can play South of Midnight once it’s live!

Game Pass continues to be a great value-for-money package. If you are a subscriber, you might want to check out the latest Xbox Game Pass information on many 2025 releases: The First Berserker Khazan, Killing Floor 3, MLB The Show 25, Atomfall, WWE 2K25, and Assassin’s Creed Shadows.
